title: Is the dredging project that is currently underway at Masonboro Inlet/Wrightsville Beach going to place any sand on Masonboro Island like it has in the past?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/05/will-a-dredging-project-add-sound-to-masonboro-island-in-2014/
